content: स्नातकः {@--1@} A Brāhmaṇa who has performed the ceremony of ablution which has to be performed on his finishing his first Āśrama (that of a Brahmacārin). {@--2@} A Brāhmaṇa just returned from the house of his preceptor and become an initiated householder (गृहस्थ). {@--3@} A Brāhmaṇa who is a {%Bhikṣu%} (beggar of alms) for any religious object; <ls>Ms. 11. 2.</ls> {@--4@} Any man of the first three classes who is an initiated householder.
